snippet: Tamir Rice’s mother, Samaria Rice, called for a special prosecutor on Friday, saying she and her lawyers had lost faith in the Cuyahoga County prosecutor.
abstract: Samaria Rice, mother of Tamir Rice, 12-year-old shot by Cleveland police officer in 2014, requests special prosecutor to be appointed to case after Cuyahoga County Prosecutor Timothy J McGinty releases outside reports appearing to back officer’s decision to shoot Tamir.
lead_paragraph: Tamir Rice’s mother, Samaria Rice, called for a special prosecutor on Friday, saying she and her lawyers had lost faith in the Cuyahoga County prosecutor.

headline.main: Ohio: Special Prosecutor Sought in Tamir Rice Killing
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Special Prosecutor Sought in Tamir Rice Killing
